title: Part 821 - Duties Of Counsel In Criminal Actions And Habeas Corpus Proceedings
content:
Part 821 - Duties Of Counsel In Criminal Actions And Habeas Corpus Proceedings

State Regulations
§ 821.1 - Duties of assigned or retained counsel
§ 821.2 - Notification of right to appeal or to apply for a certificate granting leave to appeal
§ 821.3 - Notification to defendants who appear without counsel

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
